article_summary:
The Bible clearly supports the market, the rule of law, property rights, hard work and honest money — along with charity.
It’s fascinating to try to surmise what impact the new museum will have when it opens two years hence.
Will it lead to a revival of interest not only in the Bible but in Christianity and Judaism?
In ancient Israel, the center of village life was the synagogue, the impressive building that housed the Torah scroll.
America became the world’s most prosperous, free nation by following biblical principles that allow capitalism’s dynamic wealth creation.
